titleStmt.title: Youthes witte, or, The vvitte of grene youth choose gentlemen, and mez-dames which of them shall best lyke you / compiled and gathered together by Henry Chillester.
titleStmt.author: Chillester, Henry.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through with slight loss of print.
